mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID AS buyerOrderId, obo.USE_NET_FLG AS useNetFlg, obo.PAYMENT_STU AS paymentStu, obo.BUYER_ORDER_CODE AS buyerOrderCode FROM ORDR_BUYER_ORDER obo INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_ORDER_ATTACHED oboa ON oboa.BUYER_ORDER_ID = obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_BATCH_ORDER obbo ON obbo.BUYER_ORDER_ID = obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ATTACHED obboa ON obboa.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID = obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_DETAIL obbod ON obbod.BUYER_ORDER_ID = obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID AND obbod.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID = obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL obfdd ON obfdd.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID = obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID AND obfdd.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = obbod.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_DETAIL_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ATTACHED obfdda ON obfdda.BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ID = obfdd.BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ID LEFT JOIN ordr_distribution_notification odn ON odn.BUYER_ORDER_ID = obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID AND odn.DEL_FLG = 0 WHERE obo.DEL_FLG = 0 AND oboa.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obbo.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obboa.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obbod.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obfdd.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obfdda.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_STU = "003" AND obfdd.FORCAST_TYPE = "001" AND (odn.DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_STU IS NULL OR (odn.DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_STU = '099' AND DATE_FORMAT(odn.UPD_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d'))) UNION SELECT DISTINCT obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID AS buyerOrderId, obo.USE_NET_FLG AS useNetFlg, obo.PAYMENT_STU AS paymentStu, obo.BUYER_ORDER_CODE AS buyerOrderCode FROM ORDR_BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL obfdd INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ATTACHED obfdda ON obfdda.BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ID = obfdd.BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_BATCH_ORDER obbo ON obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID = obfdd.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_ORDER obo ON obbo.BUYER_ORDER_ID = obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_ORDER_ATTACHED oboa ON oboa.BUYER_ORDER_ID = obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ATTACHED obboa ON obboa.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID = obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_DETAIL obbod ON obbod.BUYER_ORDER_ID = obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID AND obbod.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID = obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID WHERE obfdd.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obbo.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obo.DEL_FLG = 0 AND oboa.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obboa.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obbod.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obfdd.REDISTRIBUTION_DATE IS NOT NULL AND obfdd.FORCAST_TYPE = '002' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ORDR_DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_DETAIL odnd WHERE odnd.BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ID = obfdd.BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ID AND odnd.DEL_FLG = 0)

SELECT DISTINCT obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID AS buyerOrderId, obo.BUYER_ORDER_CODE AS buyerOrderCode, obo.ORDER_TYPE AS orderType, obo.BUYER_ID AS buyerId, obo.BUYER_TYPE AS buyerType, obo.BUYER_TYPE_NAME AS buyerTypeName, oboa.BUYER_CODE AS buyerCode, oboa.BUYER_NAME AS buyerName, obo.PAYMENT_TYPE AS paymentType, obboa.RECEIVER_NAME AS receiverName, obboa.RECEIVER_PHONE AS receiverPhone, obboa.RECEIVER_QQ AS receiverQq, obboa.RECEIVER_WECHAT AS receiverWechat, obboa.RECEIVER_MAIL AS receiverMail, obboa.RECEIVER_PROVINCE AS receiverProvince, obboa.RECEIVER_CITY AS receiverCity, obboa.RECEIVER_DISTRICT AS receiverDistrict, obboa.RECEIVER_ADDRESS AS receiverAddress, obboa.RECEIVER_ASSIST_ADDRESS AS receiverAssistAddress, obboa.DELIVERY_AREA AS deliveryArea, obboa.PASS_TRAFFIC_MODEL AS passTrafficModel, obboa.DISTRIBUTION_TYPE AS distributionType, obboa.RECEIVE_PERIOD AS receivePeriod, obboa.RECEIVE_EARLIEST AS receiveEarliest, obboa.RECEIVE_LATEST AS receiveLatest, obboa.RECEIVE_WAIT_HOUR AS receiveWaitHour, obboa.ADVANCED_NOTIFICATION_HOUR AS advancedNotificationHour, obboa.ANIMAL_QUARANTINE_CERTIFICATION_FLG AS animalQuarantineCertificationFlg, obboa.STEVEDORE_REQUIREMENT AS stevedoreRequirement, obboa.PACKAGE_REQUIREMENT AS packageRequirement, obboa.NEAREST_PARKING_DISTANCE AS nearestParkingDistance, obboa.REMARK AS remark, obbo.REQUIRED_DISTRIBUTION_DATE AS requiredDistributionDate, obbo.EXPECTED_SEND_DATETIME AS expectedSendDatetime, obbo.EXPECTED_ARRIVAL_DATETIME AS expectedArrivalDatetime, obo.USE_NET_FLG AS useNetFlg, obo.PAYMENT_STU AS paymentStu, obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID AS buyerBatchOrderId, obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_STU AS buyerBatchOrderStu, obfdd.BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ID AS buyerForcastDeliverDetailId, obfdd.GOODS_ID AS goodsId, obfdd.SKU AS sku, obfdda.BATCH_CODE AS batchCode, obbod.GOODS_UNIT AS goodsUnit, obbod.REAL_UNIT_PRICE AS realUnitPrice, obfdda.SELLER_CODE AS sellerCode, obfdd.PLAN_SEND_QUANTITY AS distributionQuantity, obfdda.SELL_SIDE_CODE AS sellSideCode, oboa.LOGISTICS_ZONE_NAME AS logisticsZoneName, FALSE AS isLateFlg FROM ORDR_BUYER_ORDER obo INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_ORDER_ATTACHED oboa ON oboa.BUYER_ORDER_ID = obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_BATCH_ORDER obbo ON obbo.BUYER_ORDER_ID = obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ATTACHED obboa ON obboa.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID = obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_DETAIL obbod ON obbod.BUYER_ORDER_ID = obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID AND obbod.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID = obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL obfdd ON obfdd.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID = obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID AND obfdd.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = obbod.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_DETAIL_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ATTACHED obfdda ON obfdda.BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ID = obfdd.BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ID WHERE obo.DEL_FLG = 0 AND oboa.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obbo.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obboa.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obbod.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obfdd.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obfdda.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_STU = "003" AND obfdd.FORCAST_TYPE = "001" AND obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID = #{buyerOrderId} UNION SELECT DISTINCT obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID AS buyerOrderId, obo.BUYER_ORDER_CODE AS buyerOrderCode, obo.ORDER_TYPE AS orderType, obo.BUYER_ID AS buyerId, obo.BUYER_TYPE AS buyerType, obo.BUYER_TYPE_NAME AS buyerTypeName, oboa.BUYER_CODE AS buyerCode, oboa.BUYER_NAME AS buyerName, obo.PAYMENT_TYPE AS paymentType, obboa.RECEIVER_NAME AS receiverName, obboa.RECEIVER_PHONE AS receiverPhone, obboa.RECEIVER_QQ AS receiverQq, obboa.RECEIVER_WECHAT AS receiverWechat, obboa.RECEIVER_MAIL AS receiverMail, obboa.RECEIVER_PROVINCE AS receiverProvince, obboa.RECEIVER_CITY AS receiverCity, obboa.RECEIVER_DISTRICT AS receiverDistrict, obboa.RECEIVER_ADDRESS AS receiverAddress, obboa.RECEIVER_ASSIST_ADDRESS AS receiverAssistAddress, obboa.DELIVERY_AREA AS deliveryArea, obboa.PASS_TRAFFIC_MODEL AS passTrafficModel, obboa.DISTRIBUTION_TYPE AS distributionType, obboa.RECEIVE_PERIOD AS receivePeriod, obboa.RECEIVE_EARLIEST AS receiveEarliest, obboa.RECEIVE_LATEST AS receiveLatest, obboa.RECEIVE_WAIT_HOUR AS receiveWaitHour, obboa.ADVANCED_NOTIFICATION_HOUR AS advancedNotificationHour, obboa.ANIMAL_QUARANTINE_CERTIFICATION_FLG AS animalQuarantineCertificationFlg, obboa.STEVEDORE_REQUIREMENT AS stevedoreRequirement, obboa.PACKAGE_REQUIREMENT AS packageRequirement, obboa.NEAREST_PARKING_DISTANCE AS nearestParkingDistance, obboa.REMARK AS remark, obbo.REQUIRED_DISTRIBUTION_DATE AS requiredDistributionDate, obbo.EXPECTED_SEND_DATETIME AS expectedSendDatetime, obbo.EXPECTED_ARRIVAL_DATETIME AS expectedArrivalDatetime, obo.USE_NET_FLG AS useNetFlg, obo.PAYMENT_STU AS paymentStu, obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID AS buyerBatchOrderId, obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_STU AS buyerBatchOrderStu, obfdd.BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ID AS buyerForcastDeliverDetailId, obfdd.GOODS_ID AS goodsId, obfdd.SKU AS sku, obfdda.BATCH_CODE AS batchCode, obbod.GOODS_UNIT AS goodsUnit, obbod.REAL_UNIT_PRICE AS realUnitPrice, obfdda.SELLER_CODE AS sellerCode, obfdd.PLAN_SEND_QUANTITY AS distributionQuantity, obfdda.SELL_SIDE_CODE AS sellSideCode, oboa.LOGISTICS_ZONE_NAME AS logisticsZoneName, TRUE AS isLateFlg FROM ORDR_BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL obfdd INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ATTACHED obfdda ON obfdda.BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ID = obfdd.BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_BATCH_ORDER obbo ON obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID = obfdd.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_ORDER obo ON obbo.BUYER_ORDER_ID = obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_ORDER_ATTACHED oboa ON oboa.BUYER_ORDER_ID = obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ATTACHED obboa ON obboa.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID = obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ORDR_BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_DETAIL obbod ON obbod.BUYER_ORDER_ID = obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID AND obbod.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID = obbo.BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID AND obbod.GOODS_ID = obfdd.GOODS_ID WHERE obfdd.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obbo.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obo.DEL_FLG = 0 AND oboa.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obboa.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obbod.DEL_FLG = 0 AND obfdd.REDISTRIBUTION_DATE IS NOT NULL AND obo.BUYER_ORDER_ID = #{buyerOrderId} AND obfdd.FORCAST_TYPE = '002' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ORDR_DISTRIBUTION_NOTIFICATION_DETAIL odnd WHERE odnd.BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ID = obfdd.BUYER_FORCAST_DELIVER_DETAIL_ID AND odnd.DEL_FLG = 0)

SELECT BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID AS buyerBatchOrderId , BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_CODE AS buyerBatchOrderCode , BUYER_ORDER_ID AS buyerOrderId , REQUIRED_DISTRIBUTION_DATE AS requiredDistributionDate , EXPECTED_SEND_DATETIME AS expectedSendDatetime , EXPECTED_ARRIVAL_DATETIME AS expectedArrivalDatetime , ORDER_AMOUNT AS orderAmount , FREIGHT AS freight , PREFERENTIAL_AMOUNT AS preferentialAmount , RECEIVE_AMOUNT AS receiveAmount , EARNEST_PERCENT AS earnestPercent , EARNEST_AMOUNT AS earnestAmount , ADVANCE_PAYMENT_PERCENT AS advancePaymentPercent , ADVANCE_PAYMENT_AMOUNT AS advancePaymentAmount , BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_STU AS buyerBatchOrderStu , DEL_FLG AS delFlg , CRT_ID AS crtId , CRT_TIME AS crtTime , UPD_ID AS updId , UPD_TIME AS updTime , VERSION AS version FROM ORDR_BUYER_BATCH_ORDER WHERE BUYER_BATCH_ORDER_ID = #{buyerBatchOrderId}
